title: Enhancing Customer Experience Competency: Gamification-Based 3D Graphic Software Production Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can complete 10 examples across three difficulty levels (basic shapes to characters) using 3D modeling software interfaces
Learning engagement of 80% or higher is achieved through gamification tasks (quests, level-up systems)
Teams present storytelling content (30-second animation or interactive scenario) produced with 3D graphics through project-based performances

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
